<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fatal Aria](/Feats.aspx?ID=4637) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=546" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 107 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your songs overwhelm the target with unbearable emotion, potentially striking them dead on the spot. You learn the [_fatal aria_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1765) composition spell.
name: Fatal Aria
